title: Ida M. Tarbell vs. John D. Rockefeller, Part 1
itunes:title: Ida M. Tarbell vs. John D. Rockefeller, Part 1
description:
Ida Tarbell was one of the first investigative journalists, and the biggest work of her life involved exposing exploitive and illegal business practices at Standard Oil. Part one covers her early life, which led her to that story.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
